## The Average First Passage Time

```{r}
   library(networkdata)
   library(igraph)
   g <- as.undirected(ht_friends, mode = "collapse")
   A <- as.matrix(as_adjacency_matrix(g))
   D.o <- diag(1/rowSums(A))
   P <- D.o %*% A
```
